  * Socket output format - http://www.kinetic-avionics.co.uk/forums/viewtopic.php?t=1402
  * [PerformanceOptimiziations]
  * [FlightTableIssue]

*Timeframe*

fully functional solution till April 1st, 2007 to start recording.

  * ~~remove senseless flightdata! (DELETE FROM flightdata WHERE LONGITUDE <= 3 OR LONGITUDE >=15 OR LATITUDE <= 40 OR LATITUDE >= 50;)~~
  * [TagSBSNonesense]: do not remove obviously incorrect data but tag these flights

*Timeframe*

solution till April 15th, 2007.
